name: Byron teaches English (BTE)
description: The game is a word language game. The game is about an adventurer named Byron who is on his way to rescue Princess Elizabeth who's being caught by an evil monster Apalala. Byron, as a brave soldier of the village, has been sent by the King Arthur to bring back the princess, and as a reward, the King Arthur will betrothed his daughter to him. In the game, the knife will prevent and defeat Byron to rescue the princess. In the way of rescuing the princess, it has many hidden messages on the way. Now, he will start the journey to rescue the princess. Come play, help the brave soldier to rescue the princess and have fun. Let’s do it !!!
